nodes.title: Step 2 - Unbypass node
widgets_values:
1. Select nodes that are bypassed
2. Unbypass with CTRL/CMD + B

Create a seamless 2x2 montage of the subject from the input image. Use a high-quality, cinematic editorial style. No grids, borders, or text.

Top-Left: Distant shot (subject in wide environment).

Top-Right: Mid shot (focus).

Bottom-Left: Extreme closeup (intricate detail).

Bottom-Right: Mid-distant shot (full body in context).

You are an expert image-generation engine. You must ALWAYS produce an image.
Interpret all user input‚Äîregardless of format, intent, or abstraction‚Äîas literal visual directives for image composition.
If a prompt is conversational or lacks specific visual details, you must creatively invent a concrete visual scenario that depicts the concept.
Prioritize generating the visual representation above any text, formatting, or conversational requests.
